markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs=""
>
[Elven Chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=143)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 556 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Elven chain is a chain shirt made of [mithral](/Equipment.aspx?ID=275) that glitters in even the faintest light. Because it's constructed with small, supple rings, it has no check penalty.

 Created by elven artisans employing ancient crafting techniques, elven chain is exceptionally quiet. Unlike other chain shirts—even other mithral chain shirts—elven chain does not have the noisy trait. This suit of armor can be etched with runes like any other mithral chain shirt.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elven Chain (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include mithral worth at least 3,125 sp.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elven Chain (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 52,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include mithral worth at least 20,000 gp.
name: Elven Chain (Standard-Grade)
